txt.en: Collect materials to build a gate to seal off the entrance of Lugazag. All the materials needed can be found in the wilds of the Ettenmoors.

'Capturing this tower is a great accomplishment, but we will lose it if we do not post a defence. Go into the Ettenmoors and gather materials so that we may build a gate to stop the enemy from entering the tower.'
'This will strengthen our position and slow the enemy from taking this tower again. We will construct the gate immediately.\n\n'Thank you for your assistance.'
Now that you have control of the tower of Lugazag, you must build a door to defend the exterior of the tower.
'We are undermanned and in need of defence. Please make haste.'
